QueryMap.Query: SELECT NO, STOCK_CODE, STOCK_NAME FROM StockCsvCodeDB
SELECT NO, STOCK_CODE, STOCK_NAME FROM StockBaseInfo
SELECT NO, STOCK_CODE, STOCK_NAME FROM STOCK_CSV_CODE_DB
SELECT NO, STOCK_CODE, STOCK_NAME FROM STOCK_BASE_INFO

SELECT NO, DIVISION, REG_DATE, STOCK_CODE, STOCK_CODE_VALID, STOCK_NAME, FACE_VALUE, PUBLIC_STOCKS, MARKET_CAPITAL, SALES, TOTAL_ASSET, TOTAL_DEBT, FOREIGN_RATE, BUSINESS_PROFIT, CURRENT_NET_PROFIT, INCOME_PER_SHARE, COMMON_DIVIDEND, GROW_RATE_SALES, BUSINESS_PROFIT_GROW_RATE, PER, ROE, ROA, PBR, INTERNAL_RESERVE_RATE FROM NaverFinance WHERE NOT STOCK_CODE IN ('000000') {where_query}

SELECT NO, DIVISION, REG_DATE, STOCK_CODE, STOCK_CODE_VALID, STOCK_NAME, FACE_VALUE, PUBLIC_STOCKS, MARKET_CAPITAL, SALES, TOTAL_ASSET, TOTAL_DEBT, FOREIGN_RATE, BUSINESS_PROFIT, CURRENT_NET_PROFIT, INCOME_PER_SHARE, COMMON_DIVIDEND, GROW_RATE_SALES, BUSINESS_PROFIT_GROW_RATE, PER, ROE, ROA, PBR, INTERNAL_RESERVE_RATE FROM naver_finance WHERE 1=1 {where_query}
